duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of production colleagues during evening/night production schedules.
Responsible for enacting production schedule, documenting and communicating any issues that will affect production goals.
Manage employees according to federal and state guidelines and regulations while enforcing company policies.
Supervise, train, and provide mentorship to employees.
Track the plant’s key performance indicators (KPIs) and improve through continuous improvement processes.
Evaluate and document employee performance and attendance.
Carry full responsibility for product quality and shift efficiency in daily efforts of meeting operational schedule.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or related field
